overview: Exclusive Colby Taylor's idyllic romance with Jackson Price is shattered by his partner's shameless infidelity. Deception and misunderstandings, confusion and doubt occur. Throw in a chance run-in with some criminals on the lam, some over-zealous police detectives and you have an action feature chock full of intrigue and non-stop sex, including an intense fisting-punch fucking scene between Lance Gear and Exclusive Scott Austin.
title: The Violation: Seized
